content: the crocheting guidance available as following https //youtu be/rbfyzpsqd9g the **yarn kit** link coming soon please stay tuned for updates **shop yarn here** https //www amazon com/dp/b0dk728z9v maas=maas_adg_889c290d43de9bda447aa1cbdcc98098_afap_abs&ref_=aa_maas&tag=maas stripes are one of the timeless elements in fashion trends this sweater features a solid color pattern in the center and colorful striped patterns at the edges creating a contrast in color while keeping the overall look from being too busy the sleeves and body are formed by two hexagon motifs folded into a three-dimensional shape making the crochet process more interesting large wooden buttons add to the overall fashion appeal **yarn amount** sunshine style 06# - 7 45# - 2 52# - 1 56# - 1 59# - 1 fashion style 21# - 7 46# - 2 16# - 1 19# - 1 30# - 1 vintage style 53# - 7 61# - 2 29# - 1 40# - 1 46# - 1 the crocheting guidance will guide you step by step through completing this project and we hope that during the process you discover even more joy in the colors and stitching techniques used please visit our youtube channel - susan s family to view them you can also find us at https //www instagram com/susansfamily2013/ more product can be found in this account please remember to subscribe & turn on notifications if you d like to know immediately when there s anew video up
